mapper.update: update ST_BUSINESS_WORKTIME set business_id = #{businessId}, daily_time = #{dailyTime}, create_time = #{createTime}, worktime = #{worktime}, department_id = #{departmentId}, extinfo1 = #{extinfo1}, extinfo2 = #{extinfo2}, extinfo3 = #{extinfo3}, extinfo4 = #{extinfo4}, extinfo5 = #{extinfo5}, extinfo6 = #{extinfo6}, year = #{year}, month = #{month} where id = #{id}

update ST_BUSINESS_WORKTIME
business_id = #{businessId},
daily_time = #{dailyTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
worktime = #{worktime},
department_id = #{departmentId},
extinfo1 = #{extinfo1},
extinfo2 = #{extinfo2},
extinfo3 = #{extinfo3},
extinfo4 = #{extinfo4},
extinfo5 = #{extinfo5},
extinfo6 = #{extinfo6},
year = #{year},
month = #{month},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select business_id,year,month, sum(worktime) as worktime from ST_BUSINESS_WORKTIME where business_id = #{id} and year = #{year} group by business_id, year, month order by month
